Persistent drought is drying out Chile's drinking waterAfter 15 years of a devastating drought, reservoirs in Chile are running dry, imperiling access to drinking water in the Andean nation. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 11:03:25 GMT BN6KYUNCTFKNZKGDI6GXENPCKI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/persistent-drought-is-drying-out-chiles-drinking-water-2024-03-20/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Russia warns United States: use of SpaceX for spying makes its satellites a targetRussia said on Wednesday that it knew about U.S. intelligence efforts to use commercial satellite operators such as SpaceX and cautioned that such moves made their satellites legitimate targets. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 10:57:08 GMT UFSXEY6INVMILLTJL6RQFGID6E https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-warns-united-states-use-spacex-spying-makes-its-satellites-target-2024-03-20/Reuters世界
Ukrainian drones attacked Russian bomber air base overnight, Kyiv source saysUkrainian drones operated by the GUR military intelligence agency attacked the Engels air base deep inside Russian territory early on Wednesday and Kyiv was assessing the damage, a Ukrainian intelligence source told Reuters. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 10:46:35 GMT ZSS3A77SABK3RIS5G4DUNMF7YM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-drones-attacked- Russian-bomber-air-base-overnight-kyiv-source-says-2024-03-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Spanish court sets $1.1 million bail for Dani Alves to be released from prisonBrazilian soccer player Dani Alves can be conditionally released from jail on a 1 million euro ($1.08 million) bail after serving about a quarter of his four and a half-year sentence for rape, a Barcelona court ruled on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 10:41:32 GMT DISFCEZDK5I5PPRXVIFUBCKIYQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/spanish-court-sets-11-mln-bail-dani-alves-be-released-prison-2024-03-20/Joan Faus运动的足球
Russia says strategic talks with U.S. possible only as part of broader debateRussia said on Wednesday that it would only discuss nuclear arms control with the United States as part of a broader debate, saying that Washington would not get away with trying to start talks on its own terms. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 10:30:17 GMT 7O4XHIEN6RKELHAMUB6R7S227Q https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-says-strategic-talks-with-us-possible-only-part-broader-debate-2024-03-20/Reuters世界
With no chance to celebrate Ramadan, Gazans gather at soup kitchensIn the Jabalia refugee camp, hungry Gazans hold out pots to receive soup during the holy month of Ramadan. India to prosecute 35 pirates who hijacked ship off Somalia, navy official saysIndia will bring in and prosecute 35 Somali pirates its navy captured on a hijacked ship off Somalia, a navy official said, in a departure from its recent practice of rescuing vessels and crew but leaving the disarmed pirates at sea. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 10:19:30 GMT TJGLHTU4UBM6XASW6W3KTF6JM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/india-prosecute-35-pirates-who-hijacked-ship-off-somalia-navy-official-says-2024-03-20/Krishn Kaushik世界
Russia says Olympic parade ban destroys the ideal of the GamesRussia slammed a decision by the International Olympic Committee to ban its athletes from the opening parade of the Paris Olympics in July, calling it a violation of the ideal of the Games. Vietnam's president resigns, raising questions over stabilityThe Vietnamese Communist Party has accepted the resignation of President Vo Van Thuong, the government said on Wednesday, in a sign of political turmoil that could hurt foreign investors' confidence in the country. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 10:13:14 GMT U5S77FUWGVPMHJHAMFJQDICFCM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-communist-party-approves-presidents-resignation-says-state-media-2024-03-20/Khanh Vu, Phuong Nguyen, Francesco Guarascio世界亚太地区
Indonesia's Jokowi seeks major party takeover to retain decade-long influenceOutgoing President Joko Widodo is trying to take control of one of Indonesia's biggest political parties to retain the influence he racked up during a decade in power and protect it from his successor Prabowo Subianto, four members of the ruling coalition told Reuters. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 10:07:23 GMT AOHEG5UPB5IEVMMNKBN3XZWV2I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-jokowi-seeks-major-party-takeover-retain-decade-long-influence-2024-03-20/Ananda Teresia, Kate Lamb世界亚太地区
After Navalny's death, what now for Russia's opposition?On the night he celebrated extending his rule to at least 2030, Russian President Vladimir Putin did something very unusual: for the first time in memory, he spoke the name of Alexei Navalny in public.
